description: The PAT_ENC_REMINDER table contains information about follow up messages sent to users.  These include the number of days after the visit to send the message,  the text of the message, and a flag indicating whether the message has been sent or not.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: PAT_REMD_SEND_DAYS
columns.description: Contains the number of days after the visit that a reminder/follow up message should be sent to the user.

columns.name: PATIENT_REMD_SENT_NAME
columns.description:
This column indicates whether or not a reminder message has been sent to the user. A 1 indicates that a reminder message has been sent.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PAT_REMINDER_MSG
columns.description: Contains the text of the reminder/follow up message sent to the user.
